ygData.subject: Plane of Fear Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been reading Plane of Fear is so buggy it crashes a lot.  If this is true then why doesn t Verant fix it instade of getting rdy to put up Plane of Hate?
ygData.messageBody:
I've been reading Plane of Fear is so buggy it crashes a lot. If this is
true then why doesn't Verant fix it instade of getting rdy to put up Plane
of Hate? Also if this is true then why would anyone want to travel in
there? I'd be to afraid that I'd get in there kinda far just to have it
crash andwhen I got back on to find out that I had been killed and have to
run the risk of going back in there to get my corpse and have the zone crash
again.
Has anyone of you had this problem in Plane of Fear?

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
